title: Add Task to To-Do List
description: As a user, I want to add a new task to my to-do list so that I can keep track of my tasks and manage my time effectively.

title: Mark Task as Completed
description: As a user, I want to mark a task as completed so that I can see which tasks I have already finished.

title: Delete Task
description: As a user, I want to delete a task from my to-do list so that I can remove tasks that are no longer relevant.

title: Edit Task
description: As a user, I want to edit the description of a task so that I can update or correct the task details.

title: Delete Task
description:
As a user, I want to delete a task from my to-do list so that I can remove tasks that are no longer relevant and have to show the notification when deleted.
notification message:'task deleted successfully'
